full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 74 of 236 978 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross 1 through 16. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I object. I don't believe it's inconsistent. THE COURT: Sustained. BY MR. PAGLIUCA: Q. You didn't agree with the manual, correct, Mr. Alessi? A. Yes, I did not. Q. And you didn't follow it? A. I did not -- I did my chores, I did my work. I did not follow the manual. I don't think I never did the checkmarks on the manual. Q. Okay. But you knew that they hired the countess to write the book and write the ideas of how the house should be, correct? A. I don't know that, sir. MR. PAGLIUCA: We can go to 3504-022. Page 25 of that exhibit. MS. COMEY: I'm sorry, I didn't hear you. MR. PAGLIUCA: 3504-022, page 25. MS. COMEY: Thank you. THE COURT: Page and line? MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes, I'm getting there, your Honor. Page 179, lines 25 through 18 -- MS. COMEY: Your Honor, which lines is Mr. Pagliuca proposing to read? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018175
